name: Singing Bowl Painting
description:
This immersive audio-visual piece is designed to be a short meditative trip into a mandala of geometries, AI-imagined and human-curated. It also includes a Tibetan Singing Bowl in both backwards and forwards recording, so please turn sound up and go full-screen!

50% of all profits and royalties from all Rainforests' projects will go directly to rainforest conservation charities and this is publicly documented each month on my Twitter.

This is my genesis piece on HEN.
